about.heading: About me
about.description: I specialize in implementing Front-End solutions, but I am ambitious in becoming well-rounded in the IT industry. I have several years of experience in building web applications, designing UI, and have a basic understanding of UX.
about.description-2: I am capable of working independently and as part of a team. I am always willing to help others and enjoy learning, sharing knowledge, and listening attentively. Regardless of the challenge, I strive to achieve a perfect product with appropriate performance, usability, and accessibility. I work intelligently to achieve this.

heading.part-1: I have been in the industry continuously

portfolio.heading: Some projects I have participated in

description.part-1: Participating in the development of the following applications
description.part-2: was a great pleasure for me.

personal-projects.heading: # A few projects that I am currently working on

description.part-1: In my free time, I try to implement my own ideas
description.part-2: and I am happy to share them with others.

project-1.title: Root Wood Studio
project-1.description: One of my first ideas implemented after hours. An online store for desks for the most demanding customers.

project-2.title: Dribbi
project-2.description: An application that tracks the duration of performed operations. Similar to the Toggl app, but fully free and with slightly different features.

home.title: Rafał Wichowski - Front-End Developer, UI Designer | RAWIC
home.description: Experienced Front-End Developer and UI Designer from Warsaw, specializing in building web applications and designing UI. Strong emphasis on attention to detail, good design, and clean code practices. Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, and more. Available for new challenges and team projects.

portfolio.title: Rafał Wichowski - Front-End Developer, UI Designer - Portfolio | RAWIC
portfolio.description: I'm a Front-End Developer specializing in building responsive, user-friendly websites and web apps. My portfolio features a range of projects from e-commerce sites to landing pages, all created using tools like Javascript, React and React related tools like Gatsby, Redux, Storybook. With experience working with clients of all sizes, I'm dedicated to delivering high-quality work that meets the needs of both users and businesses.

personal-projects.title: Rafał Wichowski - Front-End Developer, UI Designer - My Projects | RAWIC
personal-projects.description: Discover my passion for web development through my personal projects. From e-commerce websites to landing pages, these projects showcase my proficiency in Javascript, React, Gatsby, and other industry-standard tools. My personal projects are not only a demonstration of my technical skills but also my ability to think creatively and push the boundaries of what's possible. Take a look at my personal projects page to see the results of my own ideas and hard work.
